docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A FOND remembrance of childhood is the reward found under the pillow after the loss of a tooth. While inflation has taken its toll on parental indulgence (the going rate is a dollar a tooth in my house), there is no doubt that the tradition still flourishes.

byline.original: By Avrum R. Goldstein; Avrum R. Goldstein is a periodontist with a practice in New Haven
